name: hm04
effect: Teaches Strength to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Strength to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Builds enormous power, then slams the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: Builds enormous power, then slams the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is slugged at maximum power. Can also be used to move boulders.
